com.google.android.exoplayer.util

Class DebugTextViewHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.util.DebugTextViewHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public final class DebugTextViewHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A helper class for periodically updating debug information displayed by a TextView.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  DebugTextViewHelper.Provider
      Provides debug information about an ongoing playback.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DebugTextViewHelper

        public DebugTextViewHelper(DebugTextViewHelper.Provider debuggable,
                           android.widget.TextView textView)
        Parameters:
        debuggable - The DebugTextViewHelper.Provider from which debug information should be obtained.
        textView - The TextView that should be updated to display the information.
